title: Return on equity of BNP Paribas 2003 to 2018
summary: Overall Return on equity has decreased over the Year.
Return on equity is slightly increasing from 2008 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2012, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2013.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Return on equity, of value 12.3 was reached at Year 2010
The lowest Return on equity, of value 6.1 was reported at Year 2013
min_summary: In general Return on equity has stayed the same over the Year.
Return on equity is slightly increasing from 2008 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2012, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2013.
